nodes.bodyText: I'll wait until you give the name. I'll comment simultaneously.

as is as much convention as I'm aware of (for example Arrays.asList https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/Arrays.html#asList(T...)), are they always longs? if so just 'asList' and have it return ArrayList<Long> otherwise asLongList returning same. ?
I added two methods, for long and for String, the only returned types
"As" is strange, for the result of a query
I renamed them to queryLongList and queryStringList, so that it is consistent with the remaining methods, in particular queryLongScalar
